column4: Hello, I'm trying to use adobe flash player in amd64 using schroot, but it's segfaulting.
I'm using it with firefox, it's a know problem?
just use nspluginwrapper, it's a lot nicer, you can use your 64bit browser with 32 bit flash
the only thing I can't get without a chroot is sun's java plugin, I use blackdown java's plugin
